Description: Gorgeous Beacon Hill one bed plus office. This renovated unit is located in the heart of Boston, just steps away from Mass general, shops, restaurants, and everything else Boston has to offer! This stunning one bed offers top-of-the-line appliances, hardwood floors, recessed lighting, in-unit laundry, and modern bath. Security deposit negotiable. Dogs are considered on a case-by-case basis for an additional $200 per month. Cats are OK for an additional $150 per month. NO BROKER FEE! Available September 1st, 2023.
